text: Cable One is an American broadband communications provider. It operates under the Sparklight brand. It provides service to 24 states and 1.1 million residential and business customers. It was founded in 1986. It is headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, though it does not serve that metro area. Category:American telephone companies Category:American internet service providers Category:American television providers Category:1986 establishments in the United States
title: Cable One
